source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000010_LYSE<tab>Come to see how we're getting on?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000010_LYSE<tab><var 08 E905 ((Пришла)) ((Пришёл)) /var> посмотреть, как мы тут поживаем?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000020_LYSE<tab>We've made good progress since we took back Ala Mhigo, but there's one big issue we still have to address...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000020_LYSE<tab>Мы многое сделали после того, как вернули себе Ала Миго, но над нами повисла одна нерешённая задача...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000030_LYSE<tab>Leadership. The Domans had Lord Hien ready and willing to take the throne, but we've got no one like that here.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000030_LYSE<tab>...правления. У Доманцев есть лорд Хиен, готовый и желающий править, но у нас таких кандидатов нет.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000040_LYSE<tab>Theodoric was our last ruler─and he wasn't called the mad king for nothing.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000040_LYSE<tab>Теодорик был последним королём и, знаешь, его прозвали безумным не просто так.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000041_LYSE<tab>[EXHAUSTED SIGH]
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000041_LYSE<tab>[EXHAUSTED SIGH]

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000050_MNAAGO<tab>Suffice it to say, our people have had their fill of kings─which means we need to find a new way forward.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000050_MNAAGO<tab>Скажем так, народ уже пресытился королями. Теперь мы должны найти свой путь.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000060_LYSE<tab>If only it were that easy. Everyone and his uncle has an opinion.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000060_LYSE<tab>Если бы это было так просто. Сколько людей, столько и мнений.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000070_LYSE<tab>For the time being, we're just going to have to keep leaning on General Aldynn and the Alliance for support, and see if we can't find a solution together. Something tells me we're going to be hosting a lot of meetings in the near future...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000070_LYSE<tab>В качестве временного решения, мы полагаемся на генерала Алдинна и Альянс. Может быть вместе нам удастся найти решение. Что-то подсказывает мне, что скоро нас ждёт множество собраний...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000080_LYSE<tab>But if that's what it takes, I'm ready to talk till my jaw aches!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000080_LYSE<tab>Но ради благого дела, я готова говорить, пока у меня челюсть не отвалится.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000090_LYSE<tab>The Reach is yours, Naago. Don't do anything I wouldn't.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000090_LYSE<tab>Хватка в твоём распоряжении, Нааго. Только давай без безрассудств.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000100_MNAAGO<tab>Aye, aye, Commander!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000100_MNAAGO<tab>Поняла, командир!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000110_ARENVALD<tab>Ah, there you are! I've been searching all over for you.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000110_ARENVALD<tab>А, вот ты где! Я тебя повсюду ищу.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000120_ARENVALD<tab>Don't worry, it's nothing bad. That said, this might not be the best place to talk. Will you join me?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000120_ARENVALD<tab>Не переживай, вести не плохие. Но всё же, я бы предпочёл не говорить об этом здесь. Прогуляемся?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000130_ARENVALD<tab>I'll get to the point: might you be interested in a spot of adventure?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000130_ARENVALD<tab>Перейду сразу к сути — не желаешь поучаствовать в небольшом приключении?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000140_ARENVALD<tab>After all, we were “adventurers” before we were Scions, were we not?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000140_ARENVALD<tab>Ведь пока мы не стали Хранителями, мы были простыми искателями приключений, не так ли?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000150_ARENVALD<tab>After routing the imperials and liberating Ala Mhigo, I reckon we've earned a bit of respite, don't you? And what better way to spend it than by returning to our roots?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000150_ARENVALD<tab>Приструнять имперцев и освобождать Ала Миго было довольно утомительно, <var 08 E905 ((согласна)) ((согласна)) /var>? Так почему бы не расслабиться немного, вернувшись к корням?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000160_ARENVALD<tab>So what say you: shall we call on Alphinaud and go adventuring?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000160_ARENVALD<tab>Ну так что скажешь? Зовём Альфино и отправляемся?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Что вы скажете?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Twist my arm, why don't you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Звучит отлично, почему бы и нет!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>It's what we do, I suppose...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Давно у меня не было приключений...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000170_ARENVALD<tab>Ugh...buggerit.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000170_ARENVALD<tab>Ух... чтоб тебя.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Are you all right?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000180_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ты в порядке?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000190_ARENVALD<tab>Aye...aye... Everything's still attached.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000190_ARENVALD<tab>Да... да... вроде всё на месте.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000200_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ah... It seems both our paths led here. Very good.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000200_ALPHINAUD<tab>О... Значит оба пути вели сюда. Отлично.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000210_ALPHINAUD<tab>We spent altogether too much time fleeing fiends horrid and numerous. How fared you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000210_ALPHINAUD<tab>Нам пришлось немало побегать от многочисленных толп жутких тварей. А как прошло у тебя?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000220_ALPHINAUD<tab>Much the same, then. 'Twould appear this place is yet inhabited by King Theodoric's kin─or what is left of them. The work of terrible magicks, I fear...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000220_ALPHINAUD<tab>Примерно так же, значит? Кажется это место населяют родственники короля Теодорика — вернее их останки. Скорей всего результат жуткой магии...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000230_ARENVALD<tab>Terrible, aye, but their misfortune is our...fortune?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000230_ARENVALD<tab>Жуткой, да, но кажется наши страдания... окупились?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000240_ALPHINAUD<tab>Quite... By the Twelve, there is even more than I imagined...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000240_ALPHINAUD<tab>Более чем... Клянусь Двенадцатью, тут куда больше, чем я ожидал!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000250_ARENVALD<tab>Oh, I can't wait to see the look on Lyse's face! Thanks for believing in me, you two!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000250_ARENVALD<tab>Не терпится посмотреть на лицо Лиз! Спасибо, что доверились мне!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000260_MNAAGO<tab>Step back, all of you!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000260_MNAAGO<tab>А на отойдите!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000270_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>Like hells we will! We know who you've got in there!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000270_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>Да черте с два! Мы знаем, кто у вам там сидит!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000280_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN2<tab>We're not leaving till you hand her over!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000280_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN2<tab>Мы не уйдём, пока вы не выдадите её нам!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000290_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN3<tab>Bring her out! Bring her out!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000290_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN3<tab>Веди её сюда! Веди!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000300_LYSE<tab>What's going on!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000300_LYSE<tab>Что тут творится?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000310_MNAAGO<tab>Someone let slip about Fordola...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000310_MNAAGO<tab>Кто-то проболтался про Фордолу...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000320_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>It's true then! The bitch really is in there! I knew it! I bloody knew it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000320_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>Всё таки это правда! Эта сука прямо там! Я так и знал, чёрт тебя дери!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000330_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>We demand vengeance! Bring her out! Today we butcher the Butcher!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000330_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>Мы требуем мести! Отдайте её нам! Мясник отведает своей же стали!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000340_LYSE<tab>Butcher the...? Come on, you don't mean that. We'd be no better than the imperials! If you'd all just calm down─
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000340_LYSE<tab>Отведает...? Да ладно, вы же не серьёзно. Мы тогда будем не лучше империи! Просто успокойтесь и...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000350_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN2<tab>Calm down!? That monster and her thrice-damned Skulls dragged my man from our home and beat him to death in the street!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000350_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN2<tab>Успокоится!? Эта тварь и её грёбаные Черепа вытащили моего мужа из дома и забили его до смерти на улице!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000360_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN3<tab>Aye! And my dad! That bitch has spilt enough blood to fill a loch!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000360_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN3<tab>Да! И моего отца! Да она пролила столько крови, что ей можно наполнить целое озеро!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000370_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>We all know her crimes! She's a traitor and a murderer! How many of your Resistance friends have died at her hands, eh? And here you are protecting her!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000370_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>Мы все знаем её грехи! Она предатель и убийца! А сколько ваших друзей из Сопротивления погибло от её руки, а? И при этом вы её защищаете!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000380_RAUBAHN<tab>So that's what all the fuss is about...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000380_RAUBAHN<tab>Так вот отчего шумиха поднялась...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000390_RAUBAHN<tab>Hearken to me, brothers and sisters of Ala Mhigo!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000390_RAUBAHN<tab>Послушайте меня, братья и сёстры Ала Миго!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000400_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>Eh? Who's this...?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000400_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>Э? Кто там ещё...?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000410_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN2<tab>That's...that's the Bull of Ala Mhigo!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000410_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN2<tab>Это... это же Бык из Ала Миго!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000420_RAUBAHN<tab>My friends─you are not alone in your anger, your grief, your despair, for it is mine as well!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000420_RAUBAHN<tab>Друзья — ваша злоба, боль и отчаяние мне понятны. Я тоже прошёл через это!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000430_RAUBAHN<tab>That gnawing pain in your breast...it is enough to bring an old bull to his knees.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000430_RAUBAHN<tab>Это гложущее чувство у вас в груди, что сможет повалить даже быка.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000440_RAUBAHN<tab>But I ask you, brothers and sisters, to think not only of the family and friends who were cut down before your very eyes, but to think also of the ones who were abducted─the ones who may yet live!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000440_RAUBAHN<tab>Но я прошу вас, братья и сёстры — подумайте не только о своих друзьях и семьях, что пали от её руки, но и всех похищенных черепами. Ведь они ещё могут быть живы!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000450_RAUBAHN<tab>Where were they taken? What became of them? These questions demand answers!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000450_RAUBAHN<tab>Куда их увели? Что с ними стало? На эти вопросы мы должны получить ответы!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000460_RAUBAHN<tab>I share your thirst for justice. For vengeance.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000460_RAUBAHN<tab>Я хочу правосудия не меньше. Хочу мести.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000461_RAUBAHN<tab>But we will gain only fleeting satisfaction if we give in to our base appetites─we will never know the truth!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000461_RAUBAHN<tab>Но это удовлетворит лишь наше сиюминутное желание и мы никогда не узнаем правды!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000470_RAUBAHN<tab>Now is the time that we, the people of Ala Mhigo, must decide what manner of nation we will build for ourselves, and for generations yet unborn.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000470_RAUBAHN<tab>Именно в такие моменты мы, люди Ала Миго, решаем, какую нацию мы строим. Как для себя, так и для будущих поколений.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000480_RAUBAHN<tab>When they look to our example, will they see a people who held fast to their principles, or one who cast them aside when tried?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000480_RAUBAHN<tab>Когда они посмотрят назад, они увидят людей, твёрдо держащихся своих принципов или же тех, кто наплевал на них при первой возможности?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000490_RAUBAHN<tab>I say to you, it is our responsibility to give these prisoners a fair trial, that they might answer to all of Ala Mhigo! The Garleans called us savages, and I'll be damned if we prove them right!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000490_RAUBAHN<tab>Если мы хотим справедливости, то это наш долг — предать пленников честному суду. Они должны ответить перед всем Ала Миго! Гарлеанцы называли нас дикарями и я не допущу, чтобы они оказались правы!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000500_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>I know you're right, I do, but...I can't...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000500_ALAMHIGANCITIZEN1<tab>Я знаю, что вы правы, честно, но... я не могу...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000510_FORDOLA<tab>Well, well, well... So many visitors. Come to have a good laugh, have you?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000510_FORDOLA<tab>Вот так-так... Столько посетителей. Пришли поиздеваться, да?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000520_FORDOLA<tab>Or do you mean to put me out of my misery? To finish what you started? It's about bloody time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000520_FORDOLA<tab>Или пришли наконец окончить этот фарс? Завершить начатое? Самое время, разорви тебя пекло.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000530_LYSE<tab>That's not why we're here, no.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000530_LYSE<tab>Мы здесь не для этого.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000540_LYSE<tab>Do you remember what I said? How I promised you you'd live long enough to see us win our freedom? Well, I meant it. And not to mock you, either.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000540_LYSE<tab>Помнишь, что я тебе говорила? Как я обещала, что ты проживёшь достаточно и увидишь, как мы отвоюем нашу свободу? Я не врала. И это не ради издёвки над тобой.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000550_FORDOLA<tab>You're wasting your time.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000550_FORDOLA<tab>Ты тратишь своё время.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000560_FORDOLA<tab>All of this is pointless. There's no reason to keep me alive, and you know it!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000560_FORDOLA<tab>Это всё бессмысленно. Нет причин держать меня в живых, сама знаешь!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000570_FORDOLA<tab>I killed your men─I killed my men! And you know what my only regret is? That I didn't kill you when I had the chance!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000570_FORDOLA<tab>Я убила твоих людей. Убила своих людей. И знаешь, о чём я сожалею? Что не прикончила тебя, когда был шанс!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000580_ARENVALD<tab>That's a lie, and you know it! You think we can't tell what you're trying to do? That we're blind?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000580_ARENVALD<tab>Это всё враньё и ты сама это знаешь! Думаешь мы не понимаем, чего ты добивалась? Что мы слепые?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000590_ARENVALD<tab>You're a fool, but you're not stupid. You're ruthless. Relentless. You'd give up anything and everything to get what you want.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000590_ARENVALD<tab>Ты дура, но ты не тупая. Ты жестока и упряма. Ты пожертвовала всем, чтобы добиться желаемого.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000600_ARENVALD<tab>You didn't come this far, climbing over the bodies of your own brothers and sisters, just to piss it all away!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000600_ARENVALD<tab>Не верю, что ты зашла так далеко, шла по телам своих братьев и сестёр, просто чтобы побесить нас!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000601_ARENVALD<tab>I see you, Fordola! I see you for what you are!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000601_ARENVALD<tab>Я вижу тебя, Фордола! Насквозь вижу!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000610_FORDOLAMOTHER<tab>Come along, Fordola! We mustn't be late! The imperial viceroy will be attending today's banquet!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000610_FORDOLAMOTHER<tab>Быстрей, Фордола! Нам нельзя опаздывать! На сегодняшнем банкете будет сам имперский наместник!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000620_FORDOLA<tab>All right...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000620_FORDOLA<tab>Хорошо!..

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000630_FORDOLA<tab>Father, what's Lord Gaius like? Is he nice? Are you friends?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000630_FORDOLA<tab>Пап, а какой этот лорд Гай? Он добрый? Вы друзья?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000640_FORDOLAFATHER<tab>There you go again with all your questions...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000640_FORDOLAFATHER<tab>There you go again with all your questions...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000650_FORDOLAFATHER<tab>Lord Gaius is a great and honorable man who looks after all of Ala Mhigo. He's very busy, and if we don't hurry, we'll miss our chance to see him.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000660_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>Filthy tinhead-lovers...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000670_FORDOLA<tab>Father, what did that man call us?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000680_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>The little tinhead-lover doesn't know what she is, eh? A traitor, sweetheart. A backstabbing bitch who'd gladly betray her kith and kin to gnaw on what few scraps the imperials deign to toss her. Like your bastard father and whore mother!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000690_FORDOLA<tab>That's not true! My parents are good people! They've never done anything like that!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000700_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>Oh but they were quick to help themselves and their bitch spawn, weren't they? You're just as guilty as them!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000710_FORDOLAFATHER<tab>Fordola!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000720_ALAMHIGANCITIZENA<tab>Traitors!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000730_ALAMHIGANCITIZENB<tab>Traitors!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000740_ALAMHIGANCITIZENC<tab>Traitors!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000750_FORDOLAMOTHER<tab>Please! You have to do something! My husband and daughter are in danger!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000760_ALAMHIGOGARLEANOFFICER<tab>Soldiers of the imperial army are under no obligation to intervene in the disputes of Aan.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000770_FORDOLAMOTHER<tab>We're citizens! We have rights!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000780_FORDOLAFATHER<tab>[GASP OF PAIN]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000790_FORDOLA<tab>Father, I'm scared!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000800_FORDOLAFATHER<tab>It's all right, it's all right. They don't understand. But they'll see in time. They'll see that this is the only way to survive.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000810_FORDOLA<tab>[SHRILL SCREAM OF TERROR]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000820_ALAMHIGOGARLEANOFFICER<tab>Let the savages have their fun. They'll be more compliant once they've tired themselves out.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000830_FORDOLAMOTHER<tab>Fordola, please! You already have citizenship! Why would you want to become a soldier!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000840_FORDOLAMOTHER<tab>Oh gods, what have you done to your face!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000850_FORDOLA<tab>Forgotten it already, have you? I'm honoring Father's memory.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000860_FORDOLAMOTHER<tab>By telling the world that you're no better than a common savage!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000870_FORDOLA<tab>Am I, though, Mother? Are any of us?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000880_FORDOLA<tab>Can't you see? Citizenship means nothing to them. If you're not a pureblood Garlean, you're no different from any other savage.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000890_FORDOLA<tab>So I'll play the part. I'll join the legion and I'll make them respect me. And when the mob see that, they'll think twice before throwing their stones.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000900_FORDOLA<tab>Ansfrid, Hrudolf, Emelin. It's time!

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000910_FORDOLA<tab>It'll be hard. Humiliating. They'll try to break us─send us crawling back to our “own kind.” But we won't, no matter what. We'll bleed for them─die for them if we have to. We'll do whatever it takes to be free!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000920_ARENVALD<tab>So, you mean to play the part one last time, eh? The unrepentant traitor, whose death will serve to unite the people?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000930_FORDOLA<tab>Shut up!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000940_ARENVALD<tab>You had every chance to kill yourself. Fashion a noose from your clothes, wait for the guards to leave you alone long enough to slip it over your neck─
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000950_FORDOLA<tab>I said shut up!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000960_ARENVALD<tab>But then it would all have been for nothing, wouldn't it? Whatever it takes. That's what you said.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000970_FORDOLA<tab>...Been in my head, have you? Had a little peek at my past?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000980_FORDOLA<tab>And what, a few stolen memories tell you everything you need to know, do they?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_000990_FORDOLA<tab>Don't you dare patronize me! You don't know a godsdamned thing about the life I've led!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001000_FORDOLA<tab>The bastards that killed him, the bastards that let it happen─my father deserved better! I swore I'd do whatever it took to make them pay!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001010_FORDOLA<tab>Ugh...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001020_FORDOLA<tab>[EXHAUSTED PANTING]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001021_FORDOLA<tab>You...y-you... All that power...all that pain... It's too much... Too much for anyone!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001030_FORDOLA<tab>The things they've done to you. The lies, the betrayal, the endless fighting...yet there you stand, unbroken. How...? Why...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You know why. You saw.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>For those I have lost. For those I can yet save.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>Because I choose to.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001040_FORDOLA<tab>Damn you... Damn you all...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001050_LYSE<tab>You still have time, Fordola. Think about how you want to spend it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001060_LYSE<tab>Let's go.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001070_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>I thank you for answering my summons in these most interesting times. You have been busy.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001080_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>The liberation of Ala Mhigo will have far-reaching consequences, and there is a matter upon which I would seek your counsel.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001090_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>I speak of Raubahn, and his future.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001100_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>All know the tale of his rise from penniless refugee to member of the Syndicate, and General of the Immortal Flames... Yet though he has come to call Ul'dah home, it will never be his homeland. He is a son of Ala Mhigo.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001110_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>And now that she is free, I thought it only a matter of time before he sought my leave to return to her. Indeed, I had resigned myself to his loss.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001120_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Suffice it to say, I was...greatly surprised to hear him speak so lightly of handing over the reins in Ala Mhigo, and retaking his place at my side.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001130_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>I will welcome him with open arms, of course─he is my most trusted advisor...and my dearest friend.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001140_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>But I have known the man a long time, and beneath that steely gaze, I spied a flicker of doubt.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001150_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Whether Raubahn chooses to remain in Ul'dah or return to Ala Mhigo, I only wish that he do so with a heart unburdened by guilt or regret.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001160_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Yet how can he freely make such a choice knowing how much I depend on him?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001170_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>It is past time that I learned to discharge my duties as a sultana alone. I must go forth and see my realm with my own eyes, and hear the wind with my own ears.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001180_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Might I have your company for a brief adventure?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001190_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Wonderful.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001191_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Allow me a moment to change into something a touch less conspicuous, and I will join you outside.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001192_HIGHLANDERGLADIATOR<tab>[CHARGING BATTLE  CRY]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001193_RAUBAHN<tab>[SWINGING SWORD GRUNT]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001194_ROEGADYNGLADIATOR<tab>[STAGGERING BACKWARDS EXERTION]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001195_ROEGADYNGLADIATOR<tab>[LOUD LOW FRUSTRATED GROWL]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001196_ROEGADYNGLADIATOR<tab>[ROAR OF RAGE]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001197_RAUBAHN<tab>[SWINGING SWORD GRUNT]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001198_ROEGADYNGLADIATOR<tab>[HITTING GROUND HARD REAX GRUNT]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001199_RAUBAHN<tab>[EXHAUSTED PANTING]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001201_RAUBAHN<tab>[RELIEVED SIGH]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001200_NANAMOSTEWARD<tab>Your Grace, you mustn't! The danger is too great!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001210_NANAMOSTEWARD<tab>Please, Your Grace, come back! I beg of you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001220_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>It seems you're the one who needs looking after, Marcechamp!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001221_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Raubahn!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001230_RAUBAHN<tab>Your Grace!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001240_RAUBAHN<tab>I have kept the promise made.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001250_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>So you have. And, in turn, so too shall I keep mine.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001260_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>With your winnings, you have become one of the six most wealthy souls in all Ul'dah. And so, as tradition dictates, Raubahn Aldynn...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001270_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>...You have earned yourself a seat on the Syndicate! May your new station garner you still greater glories!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001280_RAUBAHN<tab>I am honored, Your Grace, and vow to serve with every fiber of my being, from this day till my last.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001290_RAUBAHN<tab>Long live the sultana! And long live Ul'dah!

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001300_LOLORITO<tab>A personal summons from the Scions─this must be important business indeed. Though if it concerns anything so underhand as an assassination, I fear I can be of little help.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001310_LOLORITO<tab>Hm hm hm hm.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001320_LOLORITO<tab>You have made your point.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001330_LOLORITO<tab>'Tis indeed unsettling to find oneself seated across from an impassive mask.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001340_LOLORITO<tab>There. Would this better please Your Grace? Or should I address you as “Lady Lilira,” hmm?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001350_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Nay, the deception has served its purpose. I am glad to see you found amusement in my little jest, Lord Lolorito, but shall we proceed to the business at hand?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001360_LOLORITO<tab>By all means. I must say, I am most eager to hear your proposal.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001370_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Simply put, I would aid the refugees camped in Thanalan in their efforts to return to Ala Mhigo.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001380_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>The reparations you paid in the wake of your earlier misdemeanors will be used to fund the endeavor─together with the fortune seized from the late Teledji Adeledji's estate.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001390_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>But this plan is not intended to benefit the displaced alone. I would make of this an investment which shall enrich Ul'dah and Ala Mhigo both.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001400_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>And who better to consult on matters of profit than the wealthiest man in all of Thanalan? I beseech you, then, Lord Lolorito...share with us your mercantile wisdom.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001410_LOLORITO<tab>Ah heh heh... 'Twould seem Your Grace has matured beyond acts of earnest yet misplaced charity. Pray tell me more...

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001420_LOLORITO<tab>To summarize: in return for facilitating the repatriation of refugees, and assisting in the establishment of new industry in Ala Mhigo, you ask that a proportion of all subsequent profits be promised to Ul'dah.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001430_LOLORITO<tab>I am impressed, Your Grace. 'Tis an elegant solution─albeit one lacking certain crucial details, specifically which industry and where.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001440_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>How swiftly you identify the weakness in my plan, just as I knew you would.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001450_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Your travels have taken you across the length and breadth of Gyr Abania, and you know the land far better than I.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001460_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Which of the settlements you visited would best provide a home for our refugees? Which has the greatest potential to flourish, given the appropriate investment?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ala Gannha.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ala Ghiri.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>The Saltery.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ala Ghiri.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>The Saltery.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Ala Gannha.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>The Saltery.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>The Saltery.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Clearly you want me to say “the Saltery.”

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001470_LOLORITO<tab>Yes, a quarry town certainly does carry the potential for profit─at least, it would do, were it situated anywhere near a lucrative market. It would cost more to transport the materials than they are worth. In my humble opinion.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001480_LOLORITO<tab>Yes, if a stable trade route can be established between Ul'dah and Ala Mhigo, then Ala Ghiri would once more become an important waypoint. But while such growth would greatly benefit its current residents, I am afraid it could sustain little beyond that...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001490_LOLORITO<tab>Ah, yes─that desolate little village on the shore of Loch Seld.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001500_LOLORITO<tab>I know the Saltery and its products well. The imperial invasion brought an end to their more widespread distribution, much to the dismay of many a wealthy gourmand. Myself included.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001510_LOLORITO<tab>Salt has ever been a transformative ingredient. And in this instance, I daresay it could transform a modicum of effort into a mountain of gil.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001520_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>The local citizens will need to be consulted, of course, but I trust the East Aldenard Trading Company can be relied upon to provide its assistance in negotiating a mutually beneficial arrangement.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001530_LOLORITO<tab>Naturally, Your Grace. I shall dispatch representatives well versed in the extraction of this “white gold,” and wring every last onze of profit from its production.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001540_LOLORITO<tab>The loch's bounty will contribute to Ala Mhigo's enrichment, whilst easing the burden on the Bull's aching shoulders─just as Your Grace desired.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001550_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>A deal is struck, then!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001560_RAUBAHN<tab>Apologies for the wait.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001570_RAUBAHN<tab>People are screaming for the Butcher's blood again. No sooner have we broken up one mob than another forms. Thankfully, all have been amenable to reason...thus far.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001580_RAUBAHN<tab>But it is no concern of yours.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001590_RAUBAHN<tab>We must speak of the men Arenvald and his comrades apprehended in the Peaks.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001600_PIPIN<tab>By their uniforms, the captives were first judged to be imperial troops...but after further investigation, their true identities came to light.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001610_PIPIN<tab>I daresay you remember Yuyuhase and Laurentius─the fugitives who conspired with Captain Ilberd in the Crystal Braves' betrayal.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001620_PIPIN<tab>Aye, well...it would seem they followed him all the way to the Wall. It was they who orchestrated the slaughter of the Resistance fighters prior to the Griffin's infernal ritual.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001630_RAUBAHN<tab>Were it in your hands, how would you punish these men?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Their lives would be forfeit.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Execution is not the answer.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001640_RAUBAHN<tab>Hear, hear. There is no more fitting sentence for the perpetrators of such a massacre. And that is but one of their crimes.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001650_RAUBAHN<tab>You would spare these animals? Yours is a more merciful brand of justice than mine.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001660_RAUBAHN<tab>In any event, I thank you for your honesty. When the time comes for the Alliance to pass judgment, I'll see that your opinion is heard.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001670_RAUBAHN<tab>Well, that concludes our business here, but there is more I would say. Walk with me.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001680_RAUBAHN<tab>I bear a share of the blame for Ilberd's atrocities. Had I openly supported the cause of Ala Mhigan liberation, he might not have felt driven to do what he did...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001690_RAUBAHN<tab>Things could have been different, and I'm sorry they aren't.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001700_RAUBAHN<tab>But even after all that has happened, my homeland is free. With the Scions and the Alliance at their side, my countrymen have reclaimed what many thought lost forever.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001710_RAUBAHN<tab>Under her new leadership, I have every confidence that Ala Mhigo will emerge from the shadow of the Empire and rise once more to greatness.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001720_RAUBAHN<tab>Which means my work here is done. Soon, I will return to Ul'dah, and take my place at the sultana's side.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001730_PIPIN<tab>Father...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001740_RAUBAHN<tab>I'll not deny there's a part of me that wants to stay...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001750_RAUBAHN<tab>The same part that contemplated renouncing my rank and joining you as a wandering sellsword.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001760_RAUBAHN<tab>But I pledged my blade to Nanamo. And I will not betray that oath.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001770_PIPIN<tab>Is this truly what you want, Father?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001780_RAUBAHN<tab>It is. Ever has my sword been hers to command, and ever shall it remain.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001790_RAUBAHN<tab>Thank you for lending an ear. When all the rest are clamoring for me to stay, I trust you'll send me on my way.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001800_LYSE<tab>Thank you all for coming.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001801_LYSE<tab>I am Lyse Hext, and I speak for the Resistance.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001810_LYSE<tab>Among you are village elders, refugee leaders; envoys from the Ananta and the Qiqirn.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001820_LYSE<tab>You've come from every corner of Gyr Abania to help decide the future of Ala Mhigo. But before that, I want to ask you a question.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001830_LYSE<tab>What was the first thing you noticed when you came in?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001831_LYSE<tab>For me, it was that empty throne.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001840_LYSE<tab>It has no one to sit on it now. No viceroy. No king.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001850_LYSE<tab>Would any of you like to take their place?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001860_LYSE<tab>Or should someone else sit there?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001870_LYSE<tab>Then let's sit here, in a circle. As equals. And, I hope, as friends.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001880_ALPHINAUD<tab>Expertly done. Lyse has removed monarchy as a choice early in the game, and positioned them to consider a joint government.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001890_ALPHINAUD<tab>All things considered, I would say events have got off to a fine start...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001900_RAGANFRID<tab>...and that is Ala Gannha's stance on the matter.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001910_LYSE<tab>Thank you, Raganfrid. Another vote in favor. Next, let's hear from Shanti of the Qalyana. Tell us, how do your people feel about the idea of a republic...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001920_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>The Ananta wish only that those who dwell within Gyr Abania devote themssselves to our faith...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001930_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>You shall all worship Sri Lakshmi!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001940_QALYANAPATRIARCH<tab>Lady of Bliss! Grace usss once more with your beauteousss visage!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001950_LYSE<tab>This can't be happening... No crystals were allowed through the door!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001960_ALPHINAUD<tab>We can worry about the how of it later! We need to evacuate these people right now, or the primal will make thralls of them all!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001970_ARENVALD<tab>It's up to us!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001980_RAUBAHN<tab>Hrrraaaaaagh!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001990_RAUBAHN<tab>Godsdammit! The guards were already turned!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_001991_RAUBAHN<tab>Fools!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002000_LYSE<tab>No you don't!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002010_RAUBAHN<tab>The Qalyana would see us all enthralled.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002020_LYSE<tab>Then they're going to be sorely disappointed. We have the Warrior of Light and Arenvald to shield us.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002030_RAUBAHN<tab>Aye, but they can't well defend your guests and attack the primal, can they? We're stuck on the back foot.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002040_LYSE<tab>Uh... All right. I think I have an idea. Keep these people safe, General! I'll be back as soon as I can!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002050_RAUBAHN<tab>Bah! Whatever she's about, she'd best make it quick!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002060_RAUBAHN<tab>Come, then! Who will be next to die on my steel!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002070_ARENVALD<tab>Damn it all... It's only a matter of time before we miss one...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002080_ARENVALD<tab>Her!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002090_FORDOLA<tab>What of it? Do you want to kill this thing or not?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002100_ARENVALD<tab>[PANTING WITH EXHAUSTION]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002101_ARENVALD<tab>We...we did it! We beat her!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002110_FORDOLA<tab>...What is this?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002120_LYSE<tab>...I'm only going to say this once.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002130_LYSE<tab>The Ananta just summoned their primal in the throne room. My friends are fighting her, but they need help.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002140_LYSE<tab>They need someone with the Echo, and by the gods, I wish I had it. But I don't.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002150_LYSE<tab>I told you before that you still had time, but things have changed. I need your answer now.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002160_LYSE<tab>You can end it like Zenos...or you can fight for Ala Mhigo. Your choice.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002170_RAGANFRID<tab>Seven hells... It's her...the Butcher!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002180_FORDOLA<tab>It's done. Take me back to my cell.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002190_RAGANFRID<tab>You are not forgiven.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002200_RAGANFRID<tab>Not you. You I will never forgive.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002210_RAGANFRID<tab>But I will thank you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002220_RAGANFRID<tab>For standing against a primal and saving us from servitude─you have my thanks.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002230_RAUBAHN<tab>A fine spot to contemplate the heavens...

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002240_RAUBAHN<tab>The meeting is over. The envoys have chosen to instate a government modeled on Ishgard's House of Commons─a ruling body of representatives elected by the people.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002250_RAUBAHN<tab>'Tis a fair decision, and one which signals the end of my part in all this. But I would gaze upon Gyr Abania's stars one last time before I leave...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002260_RAUBAHN<tab>Forget something?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002270_RAUBAHN<tab>Your Grace!? I─ There was no word...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002280_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Raubahn Aldynn. You are hereby dismissed as General of the Immortal Flames, and relieved of your seat on the Syndicate.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002290_RAUBAHN<tab>But, Your Grace...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002300_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Raubahn, I am no longer a child.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002301_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Stay here, in your homeland. Work with your brethren. Rebuild Ala Mhigo!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002310_RAUBAHN<tab>You desire to stand alone─I understand. But remember what happened...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002320_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>I remember full well the consequences of my naivety! And thus did I consult at length with a most trusted advisor ere I embarked upon this course!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002330_RAUBAHN<tab>A most trusted advisor!? And what of me? Am I no longer deserving of your confidence?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002340_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>What trust can there be between us when you withhold the truth from me!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002350_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Did you think me oblivious to the anguish in your eyes when you spoke of returning to Ul'dah!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002360_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>For years and years, we have trusted one another, yet now you refuse to confess your heart's desire!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002370_RAUBAHN<tab>I swore an oath to you that day on the sands. I pledged my sword─
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002380_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>And it has served me well. But in Pipin you have forged a new sword, as sharp and deadly as the blade you bequeathed him.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002390_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>I will show you a sultana who can wield every weapon at her disposal─including Lolorito and his Monetarist cronies!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002400_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>So follow your heart...please. You are home. You are free.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002410_RAUBAHN<tab>Nanamo, I...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002420_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Smile for me, Raubahn. I would have this parting be a joyous one.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002430_RAUBAHN<tab>Thank you, Your Grace. It has been an honor to serve you and Ul'dah.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002440_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Tomorrow you will serve Ala Mhigo, and fight for the good of all Eorzea. Am I understood?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002450_RAUBAHN<tab>Yes, Your Grace...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002460_LYSE<tab>Thanks for shielding us from Lakshmi, you two. If you hadn't been there, the rest of us would be worshipping her by now.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002470_ARENVALD<tab>You're kind to include me, Lyse, but we both know who did most of the work. I could scarce keep track of the battle, let alone land a telling blow.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002480_ARENVALD<tab>No shame in admitting it. The Warrior of Light has put far better men than me in the shade.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002490_ALPHINAUD<tab>Ahem. Did I mention that I encountered the sultana in the palace? It would seem Her Grace has come to Gyr Abania to oversee the final stages of her relocation project.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002500_ALPHINAUD<tab>She was in search of General Aldynn, and I directed her to the rooftop garden. I do hope he was still there...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002510_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Are you in the habit of gossiping about the affairs of royalty, Master Leveilleur?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002520_ALPHINAUD<tab>Certainly not, Your Grace! I was merely informing my companions─
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002530_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Be at ease, Alphinaud. 'Twas only a jest.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002540_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>But I must yield the floor to Raubahn. He has an important announcement to make.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002550_RAUBAHN<tab>[THROAT-CLEARING “ahem”]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002551_RAUBAHN<tab>As of yesternight, I have been relieved of my post in the Immortal Flames and the Syndicate both...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002560_PIPIN<tab>...I shall be assuming my father's duties. And may I say that Tizona has never felt heavier upon my back.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002570_RAUBAHN<tab>'Twould seem I am in need of employment. Mayhap one of my old acquaintances can introduce me to a mercenary company or some such...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002580_PIPIN<tab>You may be getting on in years, Father, but you'd struggle to find a band of sellswords who wouldn't snap your hand off─your...remaining hand.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002590_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>[STIFLED GIGGLING]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002591_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>Yes, the Bull of Ala Mhigo need not be put out to pasture just yet...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002592_NANAMOULNAMO<tab>[UNABLE TO CONTAIN HERSELF, BURSTS INTO LAUGHTER]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002600_RAUBAHN<tab>Your Grace has developed a wicked edge to her humor. And you, Pipin, would do well not to laugh when the future may hold the same for you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002610_LYSE<tab>So...does this mean you're staying?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002620_RAUBAHN<tab>Aye. That seems to be the way of it. I would be glad to aid you in rebuilding our nation. If you'll have me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002630_LYSE<tab>"If,“ he says! Welcome home, Raubahn.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002640_ALPHINAUD<tab>Well, that was unexpected...though you seem distinctly unsurprised.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002650_ALPHINAUD<tab>Either you are more astute than I give you credit for...or I am losing my touch.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_04100_002660_ALPHINAUD<tab>In any event, one thing is certain: Ala Mhigo will rejoice at the homecoming of her dearest son.
